      Deprecated. 
      In the end the EventSourceStatisticsManager.StatisticsCollector shall not be optional. Use #readFromDatabase(Connection, ResultSetFunction, StatisticsCollector, String, Object...) instead.

      • readFromDatabase

        public static <X> List<X> readFromDatabase(Connection connection,
                                           AbstractJdbcEventSource.ResultSetFunction<X> readOneLine,
                                           EventSourceStatisticsManager.StatisticsCollector statisticsCollector,
                                           String sql,
                                           Object... parameters)
                                    throws SQLException
        Read object from a database.
        Type Parameters:
        X - the type to read
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to read from
        readOneLine - a function to read one single object from a ResultSet
        statisticsCollector - an object to collect statistical information
        sql - the SQL to execute
        parameters - parameters to be inserted into the SQL
        Returns:
        the list of read objects
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something fails

      • readFromDatabase

        @Deprecated
public static <X> List<X> readFromDatabase(Connection connection,
                                                       AbstractJdbcEventSource.ResultSetFunction<X> readOneLine,
                                                       Optional<EventSourceStatisticsManager.StatisticsCollector> statisticsCollector,
                                                       String sql,
                                                       Object... parameters)
                                                throws SQLException
        Deprecated. In the end the EventSourceStatisticsManager.StatisticsCollector shall not be optional. Use #readFromDatabase(Connection, ResultSetFunction, StatisticsCollector, String, Object...) instead.
        Read object from a database.
        Type Parameters:
        X - the type to read
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to read from
        readOneLine - a function to read one single object from a ResultSet
        statisticsCollector - an optional object to collect statistical information
        sql - the SQL to execute
        parameters - parameters to be inserted into the SQL
        Returns:
        the list of read objects
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something fails
